alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 22 at 3:09PM EST until January 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy lake effect snow possible. Significant localized additional snow accumulations possible. * WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and sharply reduced visibilities with the heaviest snow tonight. Dangerous, rapidly changing travel conditions possible on Sunday with lake effect snow showers. The hazardous conditions could impact travel along the Interstate 80, 90 and 94 corridors.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
